visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a bubble chart with the following specifications: Chart type: bubble, Chart title: 'Highcharts Bubbles', Axes and labels styling: Use a dark gray color for the axis labels and titles, with a font size of 12px for labels and 14px for titles, Data series: Include one series with the data point [2.3, 3.1, 1], Custom colors: Use a blue color for the bubbles, Additional configurations: Set the chart background to light gray, add a legend at the bottom of the chart, and set the chart margins to 50 pixels on all sides.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a bubble chart with a title 'Highcharts Bubbles'. The chart type is set to 'bubble', and the background color is light gray. The chart has custom margins of 50 pixels on all sides. The axis labels and titles are styled with a dark gray color and specific font sizes: 12px for labels and 14px for titles. The data series includes one point [2.3, 3.1, 1] represented as a blue bubble. Additionally, a legend is placed at the bottom of the chart for better readability and context.
